headline: Valero Record Quarter Highlights Venezuelan Crude Shift And Project Progress
summary: Valero Energy reported record operating and financial performance for Q4 2025, supported by refining margins and throughput. The company increased purchases of Venezuelan crude following changes in U.S. sanctions policy, adjusting its feedstock mix. Management highlighted ongoing optimization initiatives and ethanol expansion projects across the portfolio. Valero Energy (NYSE: VLO) is coming off a strong quarter with record Q4 2025 results and a current share price of $181.43. The stock is...
